metadata.title: Journal Pre-proof Clinical characteristics of 25 death cases with COVID-19: a retrospective review of medical records in a single medical center, Clinical characteristics of 25 death cases with COVID-19: a retrospective review of medical records in a single medical center

abstract.original_text:  The age and underlying diseases were the most important risk factors for death of COVID-19 pneumonia.

sentences.segment_text: The age and underlying diseases were the most important risk factors for death of COVID-19 pneumonia .

abstract.original_text:  Bacterial infections play an important role in promoting the death of patients.

sentences.segment_text: Bacterial infections play an important role in promoting the death of patients .

abstract.original_text:  Multiple organ dysfunction can be observed, the most common organ damage was lung, followed by heart, kidney and liver.  The rising of neutrophils, SAA, PCT, CRP, cTnI, D-Dimer and LDH levels can be used as indicators of disease progression, as well as the decline of lymphocytes counts. Abstract J o u r n a l P r e -p r o o f 2

sentences.segment_text: Multiple organ dysfunction can be observed ,
the most common organ damage was lung ,
followed by heart , kidney and liver .
D-Dimer and LDH levels can be used as indicators of disease progression ,
as well as the decline of lymphocytes counts .
Abstract J o u r n a l P r e - p r o o f 2
